response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, and we aim to provide you with the best possible deal while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. We look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss this further.", "product_price": 950000}
